Name: Farm Frenzy Collection
About the game: Farm Frenzy is a world famous arcade time management sim franchise! Enjoy the farmhouse gems with this solid set of 12 Farm Frenzy titles! Join Scarlett throughout all of her adventures in hundreds of farming challenges. Raise chickens, ostriches, and dolphins. Bake cakes, grow crops, and sell items at markets. Watch out for those pesky bears! It's an all-out farming assault with one of the most enjoyed series ever! If you think life in the big city is crazy, wait until you get a load of the wild and wacky country life in Farm Frenzy! The Frenzy goes global as you compete in fast-paced levels in places like the South Pole, Africa, Russia, the Wild West, and the untamed jungle. Enjoy the farmhouse gems with this solid set of 12 Farm Frenzy titles: Farm Frenzy Farm Frenzy 2 Farm Frenzy: Pizza Party Farm Frenzy 3 Farm Frenzy 3: American Pie Farm Frenzy 3: Ice Age Farm Frenzy 3: Russian Roulette Farm Frenzy: Gone Fishing Farm Frenzy 3: Madagascar Farm Frenzy: Ancient Rome Farm Frenzy: Viking Heroes Farm Frenzy 4
